explanation: [0-0] A hand places a tree stump on a surface. On the tree stump are two curved metal pieces with visible rust, and two other metal pieces nearby. There is also an ax and a black object on the stump. A brown shoe is on the right side of the ax, and a white shoe pad is placed below the ax.

[0-8] A hand joins the two curved metal pieces together and clamps them with pliers. Then, using the hammer side of the ax, it strikes the metal pieces a few times, denting them. Subsequently, the black object is clamped with pliers, and the hammer side of the ax strikes it a few times, but the black object remains undamaged. The ax is then set aside.
